translations: n．骚动，动乱：指大量人群的混乱、喧闹或骚动行为。
· The tumults in the streets were getting out of control.
街头的骚动越来越失控。

sentences.sentence: To hear Thy voice through all the tumults stealing
sentences.translation: 听到祢的声音隐隐穿过一切喧嚣

sentences.sentence: In my eyes, Africa has become more "stable". The tumults of wars have ended and a new era of peace and stability is dawning.
sentences.translation: 今天的非洲形势更“稳”了，战火和硝烟在逐渐散去，一个和平稳定的新时期正在降临。
